reviewText: Great DVD to add to my collection and I have the first one so I will get all of them.
Title: True Crime Series-V03 Deadly Attractions & Crime Passion

reviewText: This series explores the lifes of fugitives who are on the run. Wife killers, and serial killers. Some have been on the run from the law for 8 years it tells of there adventures. One of them hid away in Mexico, took odd jobs and relaxed in shady bars there. Another headed for a tropical island paradise. And thought they had got away with it. But you will see what tripped them up, and how they were hunted down. Two more of the series is about unexpecting women who marry men they didnt really know at all. Such as, one of the husbands was a Bigamist. And another was a Cuban Spy. As with all the True Crime Series, i enjoyed this one of VOLUME 3 as well.  Episodes....I ALMOST GOT AWAY WITH IT....GOT REMARRIED....GOT THE WRONG FOUR PEOPLE KILLED....GOT DUMPED....WHO DID I MARRY? ....THE DEFECTOR AND THE DIVORCEE....DON JUAN DOWN UNDER.
Title: True Crime Series-V03 Deadly Attractions & Crime Passion

reviewText: I chose this because i prefer True crime stories to fiction. I enjoy mainly British series such as "Waking the Dead" and "Silent Witness" both well written and characterised by the actors. I would say to anyone who enjoy True Crime this is a msut buy.
summary: True Crimes-V03 Deadly Attractions and Crime Passions
Title: True Crime Series-V03 Deadly Attractions & Crime Passion

reviewText: If, like myself, you are intrigued by true crime stories you cannot help but find this interesting. Watching recreations is generally much more engaging than just reading the facts.
Title: True Crime Series-V03 Deadly Attractions & Crime Passion

reviewText: True crimes takes one to a new level of investigation. Interesting to see how they build a case out of next to nothing for evidence.
Title: True Crime Series-V03 Deadly Attractions & Crime Passion
